name: Golden Banana Hunter
description:
The game Golden Banana Hunter is a classic 2D platformer with 

elements of manual pumping of a hero (RPG) which is made on

the Unity 3D engine. In addition to collecting gold coins with the image of

bananas, our hunter can carry different weapons to destroy 

enemies and attractive clothes. If you have sufficient funds,

you can buy a new hunter. The game has various

used superpowers that you can buy in the store. 

In some levels there are mounts that make

the gameplay diverse. In general, the game has 40 levels 

plus 10 bonus ones.
